data.text: Praise Yahweh!
Because Yahweh has done many great things,
◄Happy are/He is pleased with► those who act fairly/justly,
Yahweh, be kind to me when you help your people;
Allow me to see it when your people become prosperous again
We and our ancestors have sinned;
When our ancestors were in Egypt,
But he rescued them for the sake of his own reputation
He rebuked the Red Sea and it became dry,
In that way he rescued them from the power [MTY] of their enemies who hated them [DOU].
Then their enemies were drowned in the water of the Red Sea;
When that happened, our ancestors believed that Yahweh had truly done for them what he had promised to do,
But they soon forgot what he had done for them;
They intensely wanted food like they formerly ate in Egypt.
So he gave them what they requested,
Later when some of the men became jealous of Moses
the ground opened up and swallowed Dathan
And God sent a fire down from heaven
Then the Israeli leaders made a gold statue at Sinai Mountain
Instead of worshiping our glorious God,
They forgot about God, who had rescued them by the great miracles that he performed in Egypt.
They forgot about the wonderful things that he did for them in Egypt
Because of that, God said that he would get rid of the Israelis,
Later, our ancestors ◄refused/were afraid► to enter beautiful Canaan land
They stayed in their tents and grumbled
So he solemnly [MTY] told them
and that he would scatter their descendants among the people of other nations/people-groups who did not believe in him,
Later the Israeli people started to worship the idol of Baal who they thought lived at Peor Mountain,
Yahweh became very angry because of what they had done,
But Phinehas stood up and punished/killed the ones who had sinned greatly,
People have remembered that righteous thing that Phinehas did,
Then at Meribah Springs our ancestors caused Yahweh to become angry,
They caused Moses to become very angry [IDM],
Our ancestors did not destroy the people who did not believe in Yahweh
Instead, they mingled with people from those people-groups,
Our ancestors worshiped the idols of those people,
Some of the Israelis sacrificed their sons and daughters to the demons that those idols represented.
They killed [MTY] their own children, who ◄were innocent/had not done things that were wrong►,
So by their deeds they caused themselves to become unacceptable to God;
So Yahweh became very angry with his people;
As a result he allowed people-groups who did not believe in him to conquer them,
Their enemies ◄oppressed them/treated them cruelly►
Many times Yahweh rescued them,
However, Yahweh always heard them when they cried out to him;
For their sake, he thought about the agreement/promise that he had made to bless them,
He caused all those who had taken the Israelis to Babylonia to ◄feel sorry for/pity► them.
Yahweh our God, rescue/save us
Praise Yahweh, the God whom we Israelis worship,
